8.3 GUID utilities

<REFCLSID>

Open class

Summary

An alias for <REFGUID>, the class of globally unique identifiers.

Superclasses

<C-pointer>

Library

COM

Module

COM

Description

An alias for <REFGUID>, the class of globally unique identifiers (GUIDs) in COM. It is a convenient alias for the use of GUIDs as Class IDs.

OLE, COM, ActiveX and DBMS Reference - 31 MAR 2000
